p: Aedes albopictus mosquitoes from Tunisia were more susceptible to CHIKV than to ZIKV and DENV. While CHIKV particles can be detected in mosquito saliva from 3 dpi, ZIKV and DENV require a longer period of incubation for transmission to occur, respectively 10 and 21 days.
